original_text: They also carried off Abram’s nephew Lot and his possessions, since he was living in Sodom.
korean_text: 소돔에 거주하는 아브람의 조카 롯도 사로잡고 그 재물까지 노략하여 갔더라

sentences.original_text: They also carried off Abram's nephew Lot
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 아브람의 조카 롯을 끌어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: since he was living in Sodom
